title: ReVerb
brief: A music training web app and toolkit

descriptor.detail: ReVerb is a music training app and toolkit, designed to be a musicianâ€™s best friend by providing industry standard tools at convenience, as well as providing motivation for both returning musicians and curious souls eager to start their musical journey.

one.descriptor: A fully functional metronome, complete with a database for storing song settings. Users can quickly save, load, edit, and delete to configure the metronome instantly.

two.descriptor: An expandable database of custom-made quizzes, structured into sequential challenges for users to complete. A hearts system discourages brute-forcing answers. Complete with various audio-visual QnA formats, offering up to 6 different pairings.
